statements: SELECT * FROM dna_sequences;
SELECT species_name, dna_sequence FROM dna_sequences WHERE species_id = 1;
SELECT species_name, dna_sequence FROM dna_sequences WHERE species_name = 'Human';
SELECT * FROM dna_sequences ORDER BY species_name ASC;
SELECT species_name, LENGTH(dna_sequence) AS sequence_length FROM dna_sequences;
SELECT species_id, species_name FROM dna_sequences WHERE species_name = 'Human';
SELECT * FROM dna_sequences WHERE species_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT species_id, LENGTH(dna_sequence) AS sequence_length FROM dna_sequences WHERE length(dna_sequence) > 100 ORDER BY sequence_length ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT species_name FROM dna_sequences ORDER BY species_name;
SELECT * FROM dna_sequences WHERE dna_sequence LIKE '%ATG%' ORDER BY species_name;
SELECT * FROM species_dna_sequences;
SELECT species_id, species_name FROM species_dna_sequences;
SELECT species_name, dna_sequence FROM species_dna_sequences WHERE species_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM evolution_analysis WHERE species_id = 2;
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_result FROM evolution_analysis ORDER BY analysis_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM species_dna_sequences LIMIT 5
SELECT species_name, dna_sequence FROM species_dna_sequences ORDER BY species_name DESC
SELECT species_id, species_name FROM species_dna_sequences WHERE species_id = 1 OR species_id = 2
SELECT * FROM species_dna_sequences WHERE species_name LIKE '%a%'
SELECT DISTINCT species_id, species_name FROM species_dna_sequences
SELECT * FROM Species;
SELECT species_name, species_description FROM Species WHERE species_id = 1;
SELECT species_name, COUNT(*) FROM Species GROUP BY species_name;
SELECT * FROM DNA_Sequence ORDER BY sequence_id DESC;

SELECT study_name, Species.species_name, DNA_Sequence.sequence_data FROM Evolution_Study JOIN Species ON Evolution_Study.species_id = Species.species_id JOIN DNA_Sequence ON Evolution_Study.sequence_id = DNA_Sequence.sequence_id;
SELECT * FROM Species WHERE species_id = 1;

SELECT study_id, study_name, Species.species_name, sequence_data FROM Evolution_Study JOIN DNA_Sequence ON Evolution_Study.sequence_id = DNA_Sequence.sequence_id JOIN Species ON Evolution_Study.species_id = Species.species_id;
SELECT sequence_id, sequence_data FROM DNA_Sequence WHERE species_id IN (SELECT species_id FROM Species WHERE species_name = 'Human');
SELECT * FROM Evolution_Study ORDER BY study_name DESC;

SELECT Evolution_Study.study_id, Evolution_Study.study_name, Species.species_name, DNA_Sequence.sequence_data FROM Evolution_Study JOIN DNA_Sequence ON Evolution_Study.sequence_id = DNA_Sequence.sequence_id JOIN Species ON Evolution_Study.species_id = Species.species_id WHERE Species.species_name = 'Dog';
SELECT * FROM Species;
SELECT species_name, common_name FROM Species ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT sequence_id, species_id, sequence_data FROM DNA_Sequence WHERE species_id = '088dff3c-8c72-4b6a-b404-1b0030ec31db';
SELECT tree_id, species_id, ancestor_species_id, ancestor_distance FROM Evolutionary_Tree ORDER BY ancestor_distance ASC;
SELECT * FROM Mutation WHERE mutation_position < 5;
SELECT species_name, common_name, scientific_name FROM Species;
SELECT sequence_id, sequence_data FROM DNA_Sequence ORDER BY sequence_id DESC;
SELECT ancestor_species_id, ancestor_distance FROM Evolutionary_Tree WHERE species_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT species_name, common_name, scientific_name FROM Species WHERE species_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT mutation_id, sequence_id, mutation_position, nucleotide_before, nucleotide_after FROM Mutation ORDER BY mutation_position ASC;
SELECT * FROM Species;
SELECT species_name FROM Species WHERE species_id = 1;
SELECT sequence_data FROM DNASequence WHERE species_id = 2;
SELECT analysis_name, similarity_score FROM EvolutionAnalysis INNER JOIN AnalysisResult ON EvolutionAnalysis.analysis_id = AnalysisResult.analysis_id;
SELECT tree_structure FROM EvolutionaryTree WHERE analysis_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Species WHERE species_id = 1;
SELECT sequence_id, sequence_data FROM DNASequence WHERE species_id = 2 ORDER BY sequence_id DESC;
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_name FROM EvolutionAnalysis WHERE analysis_name LIKE 'Evo%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT result_id, similarity_score FROM AnalysisResult WHERE similarity_score > 0.8;
SELECT tree_id, tree_structure FROM EvolutionaryTree WHERE analysis_id = 3 ORDER BY tree_id ASC;
